claims.proposed_value: Intimate Arts District restaurant where chef Jon Yao serves contemporary Taiwanese cuisine through a California lens. The converted warehouse space feels like a dinner party at a friend's loft — concrete and wood, art on the walls, indie R&B at low volume. The tasting menu changes seasonally; the bar offers a shorter, more casual experience.

evidence.quote: it feels like a dinner party at a friend's loft, not a temple of fine dining
contemporary Taiwanese through a California lens
serious without being stiff
calm, confident, unpretentious

claims.proposed_value: Dining room seats roughly 30, plus bar seating for more casual experience

evidence.quote: dining room seats roughly 30; the bar offers a different experience

claims.proposed_value: Indie and R&B at low volume

evidence.quote: Music runs indie and R&B at low volume

claims.proposed_value: Converted warehouse with high ceilings, exposed brick, concrete and wood, rotating art pieces, spare and considered aesthetic

evidence.quote: converted warehouse — high ceilings, exposed brick, art on the walls
concrete, wood, low lighting

claims.proposed_value: Contemporary Taiwanese tasting menu featuring delicate crudos, koji-aged proteins, vegetables treated with same care as protein. Seasonal menu changes frequently. Bar offers shorter à la carte experience.

evidence.quote: contemporary Taiwanese through a California lens: delicate crudos, koji-aged proteins, vegetables
tasting menu is seasonal and changes frequently

claims.proposed_value: Wine list leans natural and minimal-intervention. Wine pairings and zero-proof pairings available.
